Package com.msasc.lib.db

Class RecordSet

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.RecordSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Record>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RecordList
public abstract class RecordSet extends Object implements Iterable<Record>
A RecordSet packs a list of records.
Author:
Miquel Sas
